content: with love bookmark asimplebookmarkpatternbylochknits sizes one size finished dimensions 6 long x 1 75 wide not including tassel or fringe finish yarn 5g 17 oz of any fingering weight yarn suggested needles us 1 2 25 mm gauge 36 sts and 50 row over 4 in stockinette gauge is not important for this project notions optional tassel or pompom maker instructions co 15 sts k all sts for 5 row row 6 rs k all sts row 7 ws k3 p9 k3 repeat row 6 and 7 until piece measures 5 from cast on ending with a ws row proceed to finish option #1 - straight edge or finish option #2 - tapered edge finish option #1 - straight edge next 5 row k all sts bind off loosely finish option #2 - tapered edge row 8 rs k3 ssk k to last 5 sts k2tog k3 row 9 ws k3 p to last 3 sts k3 repeat row 8 and 9 three times total 9 sts remaining row 10 rs k3 s2kp k3 row 11 ws k3 p1 k3 row 12 k1 ssk k1 k2tog k1 row 13 k all sts row 14 k1 k3tog k1 row 15 k all sts 3 sts remaining cut yarn and draw through remaining stitches finishing cut yarn leaving a 6-8 tail weave in all ends add a tassel or fringe to corner or tapered edge of bookmark if desired wash and block your finished piece for best results abbreviations st s stitch es co cast on k knit p purl rs right side ws wrong side ssk slip-slip-knit k2tog knit 2 stitches together s2kp slip 2 knit 1 pass slipped stitches over k3tog knit 3 stitches together helpful links rope fringe tutorial making and attaching tassels misc every effort has been made to ensure accuracy in this pattern but if you have questions or comments please reach out to me @lochknits on ravelry or instagram i d love to hear from you don t forget to tag me in your finished project using the #withlovebookmark tag happy knitting hayley
